summary: Lets you choose your starting Mage Robe!
descriptionHtml:
Changes the Dialogue for Mirabelle Ervine to allow you to choose the Novice Mage Robe of your choice!

Now instead of being stuck with Novice Robes of Destruction you can choose from any of the following:
-Novice Robes of Alteration
-Novice Robes of Conjuration
-Novice Robes of Destruction
-Novice Robes of Illusion
-Novice Robes of Restoration
author: Musicman247
